name: The Gourmet Supremos: The Deep Divers

substeps.plaintext: Summon Electrogranum from the Thunder Sakura Bough next to the drop shaft and glide down through the barrier.
substeps.markdown: Summon ◀Electrogranum▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Electrogranum▷ from the ◀Thunder Sakura Bough▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Thunder_Sakura_Bough▷ next to the drop shaft and glide down through the barrier.

substeps.plaintext: Activate the device to drain the water.
substeps.markdown: Activate the device to drain the water.

substeps.plaintext: Activate the Cube Device, guarded by Ruin Destroyers. This unlocks the shaft and rewards you with an Exquisite Chest.
substeps.markdown: Activate the ◀Cube Device▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Electro_Cube▷, guarded by Ruin Destroyers. This unlocks the shaft and rewards you with an ◀Exquisite Chest▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Exquisite_Chest▷.

substeps.plaintext: Glide down the shaft, where some Hydro Slimes await.
substeps.markdown: Glide down the shaft, where some Hydro Slimes await.

substeps.plaintext: Follow the Seelie and get the Fresh Seagrass along its path.
substeps.markdown: Follow the ◀Seelie▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Seelie▷ and get the Fresh Seagrass along its path.

substeps.plaintext: Activate the Electro Monument to unlock the ceiling gate.
substeps.markdown: Activate the ◀Electro Monument▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Electro_Monument▷ to unlock the ceiling gate.

substeps.plaintext: Summon Electrogranum with the Thunder Sakura Bough and use the Thunder Spheres to go back to the surface, where the Seelie rewards you with an Exquisite Chest.
substeps.markdown: Summon Electrogranum with the Thunder Sakura Bough and use the ◀Thunder Spheres▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Thunder_Sphere▷ to go back to the surface, where the Seelie rewards you with an ◀Exquisite Chest▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Exquisite_Chest▷.

steps.plaintext: Bring the Fresh Seagrass to Xudong
steps.markdown: Bring the Fresh Seagrass to Xudong
